hermes.postoffice
Class MouseMessage

java.lang.Object
  hermes.postoffice.MouseMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message
public class MouseMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message

Message representing mouse actions.

Type of MouseMessage determined by the button pressed.

Subscription to a mouse button gets you press, release, and drag events; subscription to nobutton gets you mouse moved events.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

getButton

public int getButton()
Gets the button pressed on the mouse. Use BUTTON1, BUTTON2, BUTTON3 constants defined in POConstants to figure out what button has been pressed

Returns:
int corresponding to button, use LEFT_BUTTON, MIDDLE_BUTTON, RIGHT_BUTTON and NO_BUTTON constants in POConstants to determine which button has been pressed

getAction

public int getAction()
Gets the action designated by the event. Use MOUSE_PRESSED, MOUSE_RELEASED, MOUSE_DRAGGED, and MOUSE_MOVED to determined actions.

Returns:
int corresponding to action, use MOUSE_PRESSED, MOUSE_RELEASED, MOUSE_DRAGGED, and MOUSE_MOVED constants in PostOffice to determine which action has been committed

getX

public int getX()
Gets the x location of the mouse sending this message.

Returns:
int corresponding to x location

getY

public int getY()
Gets the y location of the mouse sending this message.

Returns:
int corresponding to y location
